label: 3. List any dates that your class will not be held. (e.g. holidays)
description: Provide specific dates, e.g. "3/29/2021 - 4/2/2021" instead of "Passover Break".  Do not include dates later than the end of your program (this confuses us).
name: 3_list_any_dates_that_your_class_will_not_be_held_eg_holidays
